entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 19. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 19. Wind chill minus 36 this morning and minus 29 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CST Saturday 24 December 2022
